weloveclouds.communication.services

Class CommunicationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • weloveclouds.communication.services.CommunicationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommunicationService

    public class CommunicationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommunicationService
    The communication module implementation which executes the network operations (connect, disconnect, send, receiveFrom).

      Disconnects from the server.
      boolean isConnected()
      True if the client is connected to a server.
      byte[] receive()
      Reads a message as a byte array from the server if any is available.

      Sends a message as a byte array to the server.
